translations: （法）官方证明信件；车票簿；通关卡

sentences.sentence: In addition, the new A4 format will enable the electronic transmission of the carnet in the future.
sentences.translation: 此外，采用新的A4版式，将来更可透过电子方式传送单证册。

sentences.sentence: The renewed ATA carnet may, upon confirmation of the local competent customs office, replace the former carnet.
sentences.translation: 续签的AT A单证册经主管地直属海关确认后可替代原ata单证册。

sentences.sentence: In addition, the continuation sheets will be numbered to indicate the number of continuation sheet (s) in a carnet.
sentences.translation: 此外，还须为续页编号，以显示单证册的续页页数。
